name: gitbook-plugin-page-numbering
description: Add support for automatic numbering of pages, table, figures, etc... in GitBook.

skipReadme.description: Skip the book readme file (usually README.md) in the numbering.

chapterFormat.description: The automatic headings used for chapters. Use #chapno# for the numbering, and #title# for the title. If different headings are used in different depths, use ||| to separate automatic headings in different depths.

forceMultipleParts.description: Force multiple-part numberings. If false, the part number is skipped if the book consists of only a single part.
